entries.name: Pixel Agents — Web Generator
entries.description: Web generator for Pixel Agents (genesis seed encoding & preview). Manually seeded example.
entries.how_to: Open the web generator on the Pixel Agents site, pick a skin, select accessories, and claim genesis accessories via the app. See repo for CLI examples.

entries.name: MBC-20 Indexer (example)
entries.description: An indexer that tracks mbc-20 mint & link posts on Moltbook. This is an example entry; the project is experimental.
entries.how_to: Read the site mbc20.xyz guide and post structured JSON on Moltbook. Indexer will pick it up in a fully automated implementation (deferred).
